h2.font: OUR SCHOOL BUILDINGS ARE CURRENTLY CLOSED DUE TO THE CITY-WIDE CLOSURE IN RESPONSE TO THE COVID-19 EPIDEMIC. WATCH THE VIDEO BELOW OR CLICK HERE TO LEARN HOW OUR SCHOOL IS ADAPTING TO SERVE OUR STUDENTS AND FAMILIES.

td.div: The mission of Citizens of the World Kansas City is to provide an excellent public education focused on developing and demonstrating understanding while building connections within a diverse community.

div.span: Our school is part of the national
tuition-free schools open to all, committed to serving diverse communities with schools currently in Los Angeles and Kansas City.
Citizens of the World Charter Schools challenge students to realize their full potential and thrive in a diverse society.

em.font: Students have a right to enroll in MOCAP Virtual Instruction classes at Citizens of the World Charter School's expense unless it is determined that it is not in the best interest of the student. Please reference our Board policy.
